Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.Controller

Class ComboController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.Controller.ComboController
public class ComboController extends Object
This class contains the necessary methods to run the stage of combos menu. This is the controller of the ComboMenuView.
Author:
Leonardo Herrera Rosales

    • addComboPaneToMenuGrid

      private void addComboPaneToMenuGrid(int indexList, javafx.scene.layout.Pane comboPane, int listSize)
      This method adds a panel to the combo menu grid
      Parameters:
      indexList - Is the index of DBCombos list.
      comboPane - Is the current combo pane to insert in the grid.
      listSize - Is the size of combos options in the menu.

    • init

      public void init() throws FileNotFoundException
      This method will be called when the view is rendered. It calls the different above methods to show all the required menu information
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - In case the pizza image source is not founded

    • continueWithOrder

      private void continueWithOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method send the new order's data to Home Order and continues with the menu navigation.
      Parameters:
      event - Is the button Continue action event.
      Throws:
      IOException - When a fxml file can not be loaded.

    • orderCombo

      private void orderCombo(Combo combo)
      This method creates a new order with the combo data. Later adds the order in the order's database.
      Parameters:
      combo - Receive a param of type combo to use your data.
